attributes.additional_details: to who it may concern,as an over-fifty tring to find employment and hearing from the government that they are concentrating on 16-24 year olds,am i the only over-fifty that is in this position or are there any more out there.to be perfectly honest i cannot believe that i am the only person in this position.having spoken to my local politicians,i am not very confident that anything is going to change unless we over-fifties make it happen.please sign up to my petition to force parliament to discuss this issue.Mr.Chris Moate
